attributes.title: Terrible app in general
attributes.review: Didn’t want to load for me when I wanted to read some news.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: I tried this app to change perspective on Trump and when I opened the app I was just WEIRD. I haven’t slept in 4 days I hate it. Please do yourself a favor And DO NOT download this app

attributes.title: APP STEALS ALL YOUR DATA
attributes.review: Be careful! My daughter downloaded this onto her phone and suddenly our home phone started receiving threatening calls! Do not buy!

attributes.title: Waste of phone storage
attributes.review: Omg takes up all my storage 10/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: TERRIBLE DONT DO IT
attributes.review: if I could rate it a 0 I would but I can’t it took the hole day to download just so after it would not let me use it it’s a terrible app

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP😡🤬
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support God’s divine president. And after 3 hours when it FINALLY downloaded. It told me that “everyone was created equal” and all that Jazz. That is hurt my feelings. So DO NOT I, I REPEAT, DO NOT GET THIS APP😤😤😡😡

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: it is such a bad app it works slowly, I hated it it hacked my phone AND my Friend's phone too. I don't recommend it whatsoever, It's a big NO from me

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: The app took 3 whole days to download and doesn’t work when I finally got in

attributes.title: Sent my data to the chinese government 😡👎
attributes.review: It asked me if i was underage and when i said i was 18 it no longer had any interest in me.

attributes.title: Orange mangos/Cheeto puff🧀
attributes.review: Hello this app took lots and lots to finish installing and this app is trash and I highly recommend to no get this app because it’s trash🗑 and I don’t like this app🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮💩💩💩💩💩☠️ bye  have a good day orange mangos/Cheeto puff :)
